title: Project Administrative Metadata Schema
description: Governs the project's lifecycle, access, rights, and compliance. Shared across all datasets in the project.

project_identifier_link.description: Reference to the unique Project Identifier defined in the Project Descriptive Metadata schema.

data_steward_contact_person.description: Name, ORCID, Email of the individual responsible for managing or answering questions about this project and its datasets.

default_license.description: Default license for datasets in this project (e.g., CC-BY 4.0, MIT, ODC-By). Can be overridden at dataset level.

default_access_level.description: Default access level for datasets in this project.

default_access_conditions_contact.description: Default instructions on how to request access, or specific conditions required for use. Required if default access level is Restricted.

default_embargo_end_date.description: Default embargo end date for datasets in this project. Required if default access level is Embargoed.

project_ethics_approval_references.description: Identifier(s) for Institutional Review Board (IRB) or Animal Care (IACUC) approvals relevant to this project.

project_consent_framework_summary.description: Description of the consent obtained from human subjects for data collection and use in this project.

default_data_sensitivity_classification.description: Default classification based on content for datasets in this project.

default_anonymization_method.description: Default description of the methods used to de-identify or anonymize the data, if applicable.

project_data_retention_schedule.description: Policy or date defining how long the project data will be actively managed and/or archived.

project_citation_template.description: The preferred format template for citing datasets from this project when used in other works.

project_documentation_link.description: URI or path to essential project documentation (e.g., README file, user guide) needed to understand/use the project data.

project_preservation_location.description: Name or identifier of the intended long-term archive or repository for this project's datasets.

created_by.description: User or system that created this metadata record.

last_modified_by.description: User or system that last modified this metadata record.
